global.name: Vikram Sangat
global.position: Senior Software Enginner - React | Flutter | Python | Node.js
global.description: I am a senior software engineer with over 7 years of experience. My technical work spans front-end architecture, hybrid mobile application development, and backend services. I also actively manage the front-end team's software development process. In the past, I have worked on web applications and data processing pipelines. I am keen to explore interesting roles in broad areas of web and backend development.
